targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_ambassadors FROM community_ambassadors;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS discord_posts FROM discord_messages dm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id WHERE dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() AND dm.author_is_bot = false;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS telegram_posts FROM telegram_messages tm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON tm.user_id = ca.telegram_id WHERE tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo();

SELECT
                COUNT(*) AS x_posts
            FROM
                public.discord_messages dm,
                public.community_ambassadors ca
            WHERE
                dm.channel_id = '1248750328896295084'
                AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo()
                AND dm.author_is_bot = false
                AND dm.content ILIKE '%' || ca.x_handle || '%';

SELECT
                ca.ambassador AS "Ambassador",
                ca.role AS "Role",
                ca.x_handle AS "X Handle",
                COALESCE(discord_posts.posts, 0) AS "Discord Posts",
                COALESCE(telegram_posts.posts, 0) AS "Telegram Posts",
                COALESCE(x_posts.posts, 0) AS "X Posts",
                COALESCE(discord_posts.posts, 0) + COALESCE(telegram_posts.posts, 0) + COALESCE(x_posts.posts, 0) AS "Total Posts"
            FROM
                community_ambassadors ca
            LEFT JOIN (
                SELECT
                    ca.ambassador,
                    COUNT(*) AS posts
                FROM
                    discord_messages dm
                JOIN
                    community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id
                WHERE
                    dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() AND dm.author_is_bot = false
                GROUP BY
                    ca.ambassador
            ) discord_posts ON ca.ambassador = discord_posts.ambassador
            LEFT JOIN (
                SELECT
                    ca.ambassador,
                    COUNT(*) AS posts
                FROM
                    telegram_messages tm
                JOIN
                    community_ambassadors ca ON tm.user_id = ca.telegram_id
                WHERE
                    tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo()
                GROUP BY
                    ca.ambassador
            ) telegram_posts ON ca.ambassador = telegram_posts.ambassador
            LEFT JOIN (
                SELECT
                    ca.ambassador,
                    COUNT(*) AS posts
                FROM
                    discord_messages dm,
                    community_ambassadors ca_inner
                WHERE
                    dm.channel_id = '1248750328896295084'
                    AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo()
                    AND dm.author_is_bot = false
                    AND dm.content ILIKE '%' || ca_inner.x_handle || '%'
                    AND ca_inner.ambassador = ca.ambassador -- Link back to outer query's ambassador
                GROUP BY
                    ca.ambassador
            ) x_posts ON ca.ambassador = x_posts.ambassador
            ORDER BY
                "Total Posts" DESC;

WITH platform_stats AS (
                SELECT
                    'Discord' AS platform,
                    COUNT(*) AS posts
                FROM
                    discord_messages dm
                JOIN
                    community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id
                WHERE
                    dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() AND dm.author_is_bot = false

                UNION ALL

                SELECT
                    'Telegram' AS platform,
                    COUNT(*) AS posts
                FROM
                    telegram_messages tm
                JOIN
                    community_ambassadors ca ON tm.user_id = ca.telegram_id
                WHERE
                    tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo()

                UNION ALL

                SELECT
                    'X (Twitter)' AS platform,
                    COUNT(*) AS posts
                FROM
                    discord_messages dm,
                    community_ambassadors ca
                WHERE
                    dm.channel_id = '1248750328896295084'
                    AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo()
                    AND dm.author_is_bot = false
                    AND dm.content ILIKE '%' || ca.x_handle || '%'
            )
            SELECT
                platform AS "Platform",
                posts AS "Posts"
            FROM
                platform_stats
            WHERE
                posts > 0
            ORDER BY
                posts DESC;

WITH daily_activity AS (
                SELECT
                    date_trunc('day', dm.created_at) AS time,
                    'Discord' AS platform,
                    COUNT(*) AS posts
                FROM
                    discord_messages dm
                JOIN
                    community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id
                WHERE
                    dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() AND dm.author_is_bot = false
                GROUP BY
                    date_trunc('day', dm.created_at)

                UNION ALL

                SELECT
                    date_trunc('day', tm.created_at) AS time,
                    'Telegram' AS platform,
                    COUNT(*) AS posts
                FROM
                    telegram_messages tm
                JOIN
                    community_ambassadors ca ON tm.user_id = ca.telegram_id
                WHERE
                    tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo()
                GROUP BY
                    date_trunc('day', tm.created_at)

                UNION ALL

                SELECT
                    date_trunc('day', dm.created_at) AS time,
                    'X (Twitter)' AS platform,
                    COUNT(*) AS posts
                FROM
                    discord_messages dm
                JOIN
                    community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id
                WHERE
                    dm.channel_id = '1248750328896295084'
                    AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo()
                    AND dm.author_is_bot = false
                    AND dm.content ILIKE '%' || ca.x_handle || '%'
                GROUP BY
                    date_trunc('day', dm.created_at)
            )
            SELECT
                time,
                platform AS metric,
                posts AS value
            FROM
                daily_activity
            ORDER BY
                time, platform;

WITH ambassador_activity AS (
                    -- Discord Posts
                    SELECT
                        ca.ambassador,
                        ca.role,
                        'Discord' AS platform,
                        COUNT(dm.message_id) AS post_count
                    FROM
                        discord_messages dm
                    JOIN
                        community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id
                    WHERE
                        dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() AND dm.author_is_bot = false
                    GROUP BY
                        ca.ambassador, ca.role

                    UNION ALL

                    -- Telegram Posts
                    SELECT
                        ca.ambassador,
                        ca.role,
                        'Telegram' AS platform,
                        COUNT(tm.message_id) AS post_count
                    FROM
                        telegram_messages tm
                    JOIN
                        community_ambassadors ca ON tm.user_id = ca.telegram_id
                    WHERE
                        tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo()
                    GROUP BY
                        ca.ambassador, ca.role

                    UNION ALL

                    -- X (Twitter) Posts (using discord_messages as source for X posts)
                    SELECT
                        ca.ambassador,
                        ca.role,
                        'X (Twitter)' AS platform,
                        COUNT(dm.message_id) AS post_count
                    FROM
                        discord_messages dm,
                        community_ambassadors ca_inner
                    WHERE
                        dm.channel_id = '1248750328896295084'
                        AND dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo()
                        AND dm.author_is_bot = false
                        AND dm.content ILIKE '%' || ca_inner.x_handle || '%'
                        AND ca_inner.ambassador = ca.ambassador -- Link back to outer query's ambassador
                    GROUP BY
                        ca.ambassador, ca.role
                )
                SELECT
                    ambassador AS "Ambassador",
                    role AS "Role",
                    SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'Discord' THEN post_count ELSE 0 END) AS "Discord Posts",
                    SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'Telegram' THEN post_count ELSE 0 END) AS "Telegram Posts",
                    SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'X (Twitter)' THEN post_count ELSE 0 END) AS "X Posts",
                    SUM(post_count) AS "Total Posts"
                FROM
                    ambassador_activity
                GROUP BY
                    ambassador, role
                ORDER BY
                    "Total Posts" DESC;
